title: EntityChemicalMaterialFrame
description: Schema for the ChemicalMaterialFrame, representing a single chemical substance or material.

frame_type.description: Constant identifier for this frame family; always "chemical_material".

entity.description: Underlying entity this frame describes (e.g. the Wikidata item for the compound or material).

formula.description: Preferred chemical formula (ASCII or Unicode), e.g. "NaCl", "C6H6", "Hâ‚‚O".

iupac_name.description: IUPAC systematic name, if available (e.g. "sodium chloride").

common_names.description: List of common names and synonyms; language-neutral labels.

phase_at_stp.description: Aggregate state at standard temperature and pressure, e.g. "solid", "liquid", "gas".

appearance.description: Short free-form description of appearance, e.g. "white crystalline solid".

molar_mass.description: Molar mass represented as a Quantity-like object (number + unit + optional qualifiers).

density.description: Density near room conditions, represented as a Quantity-like object.

melting_point.description: Melting point represented as a temperature Quantity-like object.

boiling_point.description: Boiling point represented as a temperature Quantity-like object.

categories.description: High-level classification labels, such as "alkali metal", "polymer", "alloy".

uses.description: List of salient applications / uses as short phrases.

hazards.description: List of salient hazards or safety concerns as short phrases.

extra.description: Arbitrary metadata or source-specific payload (e.g. original statements, IDs, mapping info).
